column4: You probably need to update your package cache. "sudo apt-get update" in the terminal, or the relevant button in Synaptic/whatever.
what is the difference between aptitude and apt-get/
If it's the one you're currently using (check with uname -r) and it works fine, yes
1) Lucid questions go in #ubuntu+1, 2) I have 4GB and no swap partition, and it works fine (except I don't get hibernation)
